channel.title: VAST Software on VAST | Visualization and Analysis Software and Technology
channel.description: Recent content in VAST Software on VAST | Visualization and Analysis Software and Technology

item.title: VAPOR
item.description: VAPOR is an interactive, GUI based package that provides advanced, interactive visualization of 3D scientific data.

item.title: GeoCAT
item.description: The GeoCAT suite of packages provides Python utilities to analyze and visualize all manner of geoscientific numerical data.
